name: Computer Security 101
short_description: Virtual security is not something worth leaving to chance. A lot of users understand the importance of installing dedicated antivirus software, but this is usually where there preventative measures stop. Most people don’t give much thought to firewalls, critical operating system updates, or cloud backup services. The Internet is an incredible thing, but it is also the newest setting for criminals to get away with theft and other unsavory acts. What should you be doing now to protect your data?
summary: Virtual security is not something worth leaving to chance. A lot of us
